overview: When Ryann has yet another painful orgasm, her best friend Noor finally convinces her to visit a local Chicago sex shop, Early to Bed. At Early to Bed, Noor introduces Ryann to a plethora of toys and lubricants. She teaches Ryann that sex should be fun, can be less painful and even pain free. Featuring local Chicago hip hop and indie artists, this light hearted comedy focuses on a serious issue: chronic pelvic pain.
